mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logic ( original_no, project_no, summary, contents, category, generating_date, source_no, user_id ) VALUES ( #{original_no}, #{project_no}, #{summary}, #{contents}, #{category}, now(), #{source_no}, (select user_id from user_info where id = #{id}) )

INSERT INTO file_detail ( attached_file_no, attached_file_directory, attached_file_name, attached_file_type, attached_file_date ) VALUES
( #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_NO}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_DIRECTORY}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME}, #{item.ATTACHED_FILE_TYPE}, now() )
INSERT INTO evaluation_logic (evaluation_no, score, original_no, evaluating_date, user_id, comment) VALUES (uuid(), #{SCORE}, #{original_no}, now(), #{user_id}, #{COMMENT} );
mapper.select: select count(e.evaluation_no) sum, count(e2.evaluation_no) sumOfAccept from (select * from evaluation_logic) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from evaluation_logic where score = 'Accept' ) e2 on e.evaluation_no = e2.evaluation_no where e.original_no = #{original_no};
